events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred at an intersection on April 9th. The vehicle sustained significant front-end damage.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident following review of the initial accident details provided by the policyholder.
An agent specializing in auto claims was assigned to review the details and support the customer through the claim process.
The claim was formally acknowledged, and the customer received confirmation along with next steps for submitting necessary documents.
The customer was requested to provide a police report, photos of vehicle damage, and repair estimates to proceed with the investigation.
All requested documents including the police report and repair quotes were submitted by the customer promptly within the required timeframe.
The investigation into the circumstances and liability of the accident began following review of customer submitted documents.
Investigation has concluded with confirmation that the other party was at fault. The claim is eligible for full coverage.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer, covering all repair costs and additional fees as per the policy terms.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the claim handling process and the promptness of the settlement proposal.
The claim received formal approval from the claims manager after the customer accepted the settlement offer.
Payment for the approved claim was issued to the customerâ€™s account covering vehicle repairs as agreed in settlement.
The claim was officially closed following completion of payment issuance and confirmation of customer satisfaction.
